thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1890
thread.title: Mary Ann Robinson
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by Mary Ann Robinson

author: Mary Ann Robinson
title: Mary Ann Robinson
text: I was concerned about baggage allowance on Airdolomiti, a smaller branch airline. I tried repeatedly to call FlightHub. The automated phone line just ran in circles and I never got to speak to a live person. I would not recommend this company and doubt that I will ever book through them again.
